Articles.Content:
It broke my game

I have to redownload the full programme....

That's just because the devs have been telling everyone to NOT use the patcher until further notice.

That's been pretty much for about the last 3 full versions or so.

It broke my game

I have to redownload the full programme....

Patcher hasn't been updated in several versions. You will need to go to the store and download a full copy or transfer your purchase to steam and update it there.
Everybody has to redownload the full updated program and relocate our game saves. I have read in several posts in these threads Do Not Use the patcher.

Do yourself a favor,

Unless you have something against it, go Steam

With 2 clics you can :

- Install the whole thing

- choose auto/manual update

- Check local file and repair the installation if needed

- Roll back to previous version

- Remove all local files

And it will download the game within seconds (depending on your internet connection)

Do yourself a favor,

Unless you have something against it, go Steam

With 2 clics you can :

- Install the whole thing

- choose auto/manual update

- Check local file and repair the installation if needed

- Roll back to previous version

- Remove all local files

And it will download the game within seconds (depending on your internet connection)

Yes, correct, BUT you missing one small important bit of information.. - if you upgrade from 0.2.0 to 0.2.1 on steam, and then go back to the previous version, it will take you back to 0.1.9 NOT 0.2.0...
